definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: No one’s ever looked at the brain waves before with human-animal interaction.
sentences.chinese: 以前从没有人就人与动物的互动来观察人类的脑电波。

sentences.english: The robust RJ45 connectors are also shielded against electrical interference.
sentences.chinese: 强劲的RJ45连接器也屏蔽防止电波干扰。

sentences.english: This high frequency alternating current produces the high frequency radio waves mentioned in the previous chapter.
sentences.chinese: 这种高频交流电流产生前一章提到过的高频无线电波。

sentences.english: Cellphones use ultra-high-frequency radio waves to connect with telecommunications networks.
sentences.chinese: 手机利用超高频无线电波与通讯网络取得联系。

sentences.english: Marconi's radio greatly increased the speed of communications.
sentences.chinese: 无线电报的电波传送极大地提高了通讯联络的速度。

sentences.english: It is a bit like radiowaves coding different radio stations at different frequency bands.
sentences.chinese: 这有点像无线电波在不同的频段接收不同的广播电台。

sentences.english: In this paper the propagation attenuations of the radio waves in two different cases are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了两种通讯方式的电波传输损耗。

sentences.english: Through CDs and audiotapes, brainwave technology will make use of tools that will help condition your brainwaves.
sentences.chinese: 通过CD和录音带，脑电波科技会调制你的脑电波。

sentences.english: Through CDs and audiotapes, brainwave technology will make use of tools that will help condition your brainwaves.
sentences.chinese: 通过CD和录音带，脑电波科技会调制你的脑电波。

sentences.english: They use the radio waves to talk, but the signals don't come from them.
sentences.chinese: 它们是用无线电波交谈，不过那些信号并不来自它们。

sentences.english: The time-code receiver IC is the core of the radio-controlled clock.
sentences.chinese: 时间编码接收芯片是电波钟表的核心。

sentences.english: Not the least is their impact on our ability to reproduce.
sentences.chinese: 电波的作用不仅体现在对我们的生育能力影响上。

sentences.english: You can't touch a radio wave.
This range of wavelengths falls into the radio part of the electromagnetic spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 这个范围的波长落在电磁波谱上的无线电波段。

sentences.english: The device used for sending the waves off into space is known as aerial or antenna.
sentences.chinese: 电波送入太空的装置称为架空线或天线。

sentences.english: If the array picks up radio waves, then what do we do?
sentences.chinese: 如果望远镜阵收到了无线电波，那我们做什么？
